tourist_places.name: The Pearl-Qatar
tourist_places.description: An artificial island and luxury development in Doha, featuring upscale residences, shopping malls, restaurants, and marinas. The Pearl-Qatar is known for its elegant architecture and waterfront views.

tourist_places.name: Souq Waqif
tourist_places.description: A traditional market in Doha known for its bustling atmosphere, winding alleyways, and shops selling spices, textiles, and souvenirs. Souq Waqif is also home to numerous restaurants and cafes.

tourist_places.name: Katara Cultural Village
tourist_places.description: A cultural complex in Doha featuring theaters, galleries, performance venues, and outdoor spaces. Katara Cultural Village hosts various events and festivals celebrating Qatari heritage and international arts.

tourist_places.name: Zubarah Fort
tourist_places.description: A historic fort in the northwestern coast of Qatar, built in the 18th century. Zubarah Fort is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and offers insights into Qatar's maritime history and heritage.
